answers.answer: HiThanks for the post!In your case the cause of hematuria should be diagnosed. That is the clue to your treatment.It will be worthwhile to get all the kidney function tests done. Also prostatitis and epididymitis should be completely ruled out. The second time you did not respond to Cipro is because the bacteria or whatever organism is causing the infection has become resistant to the antibiotic. Get a culture/sensitivity test of urine done. Also get your semen tested for infection.Please go through this link and correlate with your case: http://www.kidney.niddk.nih.gov/kudiseases/pubs/impotence/Are you on any medication for any disease?It is difficult to comment beyond this at this stage. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
